Class Centipede

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Centipede

public class Centipede
extends greenfoot.Actor

Centipede, the enemy insect that moves toward the player, navigating through mushrooms to do so. Centipedes are vulnerable to lasers. Every level, the color scheme of the centipede changes. Number of centipedes spawned and the speed of the centipede may vary among different levels.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Bill Xiang
